description: A versatile waterproof trail shoe to do it all, the Sense Ride 5 Gore-Tex is in its element on short, fast trail runs or ultra distances. A super comfortable overachiever that adapts to a variety of terrains, with a balanced midsole for cushioning, response and an engineered mesh upper with Sensifit™ for just the right amount of comfortable hold.
name: Salomon Sense Ride 5 GTX - Mens
